UserInterface

类 ProduceBombs

  • java.lang.Object
    • Library.Bomb
      • UserInterface.ProduceBombs

  • public class ProduceBombs
extends Bomb
    This class provides a method to generate bombs on the board. This class mainly uses recursion algorithm to put bombs on different squares.
    从以下版本开始:
    2019-03-12 20:18
    版本:
    V1.0
    作者:
    Hephaest

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ProduceBombs(GameBoard board, int number)
      Create a ProduceBombs instance to generate bombs at the given board.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void reproduceBomb()
      This method produce bombs on random square.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ProduceBombs

        public ProduceBombs(GameBoard board,
                    int number)
        Create a ProduceBombs instance to generate bombs at the given board. Using recursion algorithm to avoid generating more than one bomb on the same square.
        参数:
        board - the GameBoard upon which user clicks on.
        number - the total number of bombs.

    • 方法详细资料

      • reproduceBomb

        public void reproduceBomb()
        This method produce bombs on random square. If the assigned square has already contained a bomb, then reassign a square to receive this bomb by invoking itself.
